description: This column stores audit items which detail how patient-entered questionnaire responses were submitted.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANSWER_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the method/application by which patient-entered questionnaire responses were saved or updated (e.g. MyChart and/or Welcome).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


MyChart


Welcome


EpicCare


MyChart Bedside


FHIR


Bedside in MyChart Mobile

columns.name: ANSWER_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant at which patient-entered questionnaire responses were saved or updated.

columns.name: ANSWER_USER_ID
columns.description: When applicable, this column stores EpicCare users who saved or updated patient-entered questionnaire responses on behalf of patients.

columns.name: ANSWER_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the MyChart user ID who last updated the questionnaire answers.

columns.name: ANSWER_PAT_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the relationship to the patient of the user who last updated the questionnaire answers on behalf of the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ANSWER_BY_KIOSK_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a questionnaire that was answered in Welcome was answered by the patient or a patient representative. 'Y' indicates that the questionnaire was answered by the patient. 'N' indicates that the questionnaire was answered by a patient representative. NULL indicates that the questionnaire was not answered in Welcome.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
